Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, six lines of text containing a duplicate of the final episode of the 'Teaching of Amenemhat', XVa-g (P. Millingen 3, 9-12 = P. Sallier II 12, 5-8).
Curator's comments: Bib: R.J.Demaree, Ramesside Ostraca (London 2002), p.45, pl.208. Published: F. Adrom, Die Lehre des Amenemhet (BAe 19, 2006). The text of this poem is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Translation of Amenemhat: Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and other Ancient Egyptian Poems 1940-1640 BC (Oxford World's Classics 1999), 203-11.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393920) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393920)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
